columns.name: backup_vault_name
columns.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored.

columns.name: recovery_point_arn
columns.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a recovery point.

columns.name: resource_type
columns.description: The type of Amazon Web Services resource to save as a recovery point.

columns.name: status
columns.description: A status code specifying the state of the recovery point.

columns.name: backup_size_in_bytes
columns.description: The size, in bytes, of a backup.

columns.name: backup_vault_arn
columns.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a backup vault.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The date and time that a recovery point is created.

columns.name: completion_date
columns.description: The date and time that a job to create a recovery point is completed.

columns.name: encryption_key_arn
columns.description: The server-side encryption key used to protect your backups.

columns.name: iam_role_arn
columns.description: Specifies the IAM role ARN used to create the target recovery point.

columns.name: is_encrypted
columns.description: A Boolean value that is returned as TRUE if the specified recovery point is encrypted, or FALSE if the recovery point is not encrypted.

columns.name: last_restore_time
columns.description: The date and time that a recovery point was last restored.

columns.name: resource_arn
columns.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a saved resource.

columns.name: source_backup_vault_arn
columns.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the source vault where the resource was originally backed up in.

columns.name: status_message
columns.description: A status message explaining the reason for the recovery point deletion failure.

columns.name: storage_class
columns.description: Specifies the storage class of the recovery point. Valid values are WARM or COLD.

columns.name: calculated_lifecycle
columns.description: An object containing DeleteAt and MoveToColdStorageAt timestamps.

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: Contains identifying information about the creation of a recovery point, including the BackupPlanArn, BackupPlanId, BackupPlanVersion, and BackupRuleId of the backup plan used to create it.

columns.name: lifecycle
columns.description: The lifecycle defines when a protected resource is transitioned to cold storage and when it expires.
